column2: Shiny New Faith

And the bezan shall be huge and black, and the eyes thereof red with the blood of living creatures, and the whore of Babylon shall ride forth on a three-headed serpent, and throughout the lands, there'll be a great rubbing of parts.  Yeeah.\n\n -- Brian  15:1

And the bezan shall be huge and black, and the eyes thereof red with the blood of living creatures, and the whore of Babylon shall ride forth on a three-headed serpent, and throughout the lands, there'll be a great rubbing of parts.  Yeeah.

 -- Brian  15:1

And Saint Attila raised the hand grenade up on high, saying, "O Lord, bless this Thy hand grenade that, with it, Thou mayest blow Thine enemies to tiny bits in Thy mercy."\n\n -- Armaments  2:9

Shiny New Faith

Breathe some new life into that busted old religion.  Brand new flavor--same great name!


And lo, the Angel of The Lord did speak, and verily he said unto me: 

"And now shalt thou go forth, and remake the faith in the image of thyself, that it may be all shiny and new."

 -- I Conniptions  3:14-15

Shiny New Faith
A Shiny New Faith Awaits!

WARNING:  Proceeding beyond this point will change the settings of your current faith to the Shiny New Faith defaults.  This is done so the faith and the menu interface can be put in sync.  It will not alter any setting that cannot be restored using this mod.\n\nNote that you will lose any concubines you may have, so if you intend to keep them, you should mark them as a special interest and re-take them after the conversion.  You may re-enable concubinage by setting Maximum # of Wives to 1.
